name: The Music Tank
body:
There are still social features to be retouched, but I'll make things prettier as we go along. I just want to launch as soon as possible.

I will be moving the codebase from bitbucket to GitHub. All updates will then be public and you will be able to see the progress made.

[Francois](http://www.twitter.com/francoisfaubert)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
